# Car Insurance Fraud Detection and Customer Segmentation

Dataset source: <https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/khusheekapoor/vehicle-insurance-fraud-detection/>

## Importing libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
library(caret) # over/undersampling
```

## Exploring the data

```{r}
carclaims <- read_csv("./carclaims.csv")
```

```{r}
glimpse(carclaims)
```

```{r}
table_fraud <- table(carclaims$FraudFound)
table_fraud
```

```{r}
freq_fraud <- data.frame(table_fraud)
freq_fraud
```

```{r}
ggplot(carclaims, aes(x = FraudFound)) +
  geom_bar()
```
